Reviews.Title: “an unbelievably relaxing trip with a perfect eye into life in chicago”

Reviews.Content: staff dana hotel definitely experience remembered incredibly helpful extremely friendly lunch breakfast hotel rest food delicious service drinks roof level bar spectacular views vibrant crowd amazing modern especially loved rain shower window view showering floor ceiling windows endless glimpse chicago life literally neighboring rises feel everyday chicago blocks michigan ave january wasnt bad walk deal january pleased check check

Reviews.Content: dinner cocktails aja restaurant dana metropolitan city feel space textured layers decor service sterling gracious polished food delicious party mouth eastern flavors recommending crab sea bass dinner definitely recommended
